registration-requests.introText1: The application request board includes all current outstanding application requests as well as an overview of confirmed and declined company applications to the Catena-X Network.
registration-requests.introText2: If an application is approved, the registration company will receive access to the CX portal to start the technical and functional onboarding. Please make sure that you validate the application request details before approving a request.

confirmmodal.title: Confirm action
confirmmodal.description: Are you sure to make action on selected request?

stage.title: Catena-X
stage.subtitle: the gateway to the automotive digital network

emptyCards.title: New apps will get added here as soon as you have any assigned

favoriteSection.title: My Favorite Applications
favoriteSection.noFavoriteDescription: Your app favorites will show up in this section as soon as favorites selected.

semantichub.title: Semantic Data Models
semantichub.introText_0: Semantic models are used to structure data. As a concept, they make it possible to give fundamental meaning to data and their relationships. In the context of data modeling and data organization they realize the development of applications as well as the maintenance of data consistency.
semantichub.introText_1: In Catena-X, semantic data models are provided in a suitable publication system, the so-called Semantic Hub. For data or service providers, the Semantic Hub presents a foundation for the use and reuse of semantic models. For this reason, the publication of a semantic data model takes place under the specification of a version. This supports transparency as well as control over all semantic models and their release status.

filter.objNamePlaceholder: Enter a object name to filter

deleteDialog.title: Delete aspect model
deleteDialog.subtitle: Are you sure you want to delete the aspect model?
deleteDialog.info: Note: If you delete the model now, you won't be able to reactivate it later.

detail.fileError: Error: The file could not be loaded.
detail.ttlTooltip: The downloaded Turtle file looks different but is semantically the same compared to the uploaded Turtle file for the Aspect. To further develop existing Aspects refer to the source Turtle files (e.g. in the Catena-X BAMM Model GitHub Repository)
detail.downloadTitle: Download options related to this aspect model

openApi.inputLabel: Enter a base URL to change the default open API URL.

detail.nomodelText: The used URN is either incorrect or the model does not yet exist.

recently.subheader: Below you can find your recently changed apps. By clicking on the app, you can open up the deatils/proceed on the app release process. The sub-menu added to each app card will help you to do changes on active apps. Below the recent changed apps, a list of all by your company provided apps can get found. Please scroll down to get more details.

confirmModal.title: Change app {appName}
confirmModal.description: The app configuration is currently 'work in progress'. Do you want to open the app release process for {appName} and further enhance the app details? Please note you do not need to finish the app release configuration. You can use the save button and proceed later if wanted.

details.title: Submitted App Details
details.description: The app {appName} is already submitted for review by the network administrator to publish the app on the market place. Till the review is finished, you can not do any changes to the app

edcconnector.imagetext: The connector combines the benefits of IDS connectors (secure and standardized communication, data usage control) with the interoperability. To register your connector inside the network and create your connector self-description, please register your connector below.

deletemodal.title: Delete EDC Connector
deletemodal.description: Are you sure to delete selected connector?

company.title: Connect company connector
company.intro: Registration of a company connector which is implemented in your own company network.

managed.title: Register Managed Connector
managed.intro: Register a managed connector of your customer / 3rd party provided. This selection is mainly service provider relevant, which offers managed connectors to data provider/consumer. If you want to register your own connector, please use the selection above.

name.label: Name*
name.error: Connector name is mandatory. Length should be between 2 and 20
name.tooltipMsg: Own selected connector name for verification

url.label: URL*
url.error: This field needs to be valid url eg: https://catena-x.net
url.tooltipMsg: URL of the connector endpoint. Only https: endpoints are allowed

bpn.label: Owner*
bpn.error: BPN is mandatory. Valid BPN eg: BPNLXXXXXXXXXXXX
bpn.tooltipMsg: BPN of the company in which name the connector will be used to generate data offers or consume data

country.label: Place*
country.tooltipMsg: Connector Location - Message to be added

partnernetwork.membershipnotificationdescription: Please note that the membership information might be incorrect.

invite.headerIntro: Add below the business partner registration contact and the company name.
invite.inviteText2: Invite a new partner to Catena-X.
invite.successSubText: The window will close automatically. In case it doesn't, please use the 'close' button on the top right.
invite.failure: Error - Business Partner was not invited
invite.failureSubText: An error occured. Please try it again later.

provisionIdp.title: Setup your company IDP
provisionIdp.success: Your identity provider was provisioned successfully

header.title: App Roles
header.subtitle: Below you can find an overview of the available app roles as well as a role description by selectiong the 'Role Description' field. To add the user role to an existing active company user, please use the 'add role' button below the 'Available Role' area.

editRoles.title: Manage roles for
editRoles.subtitle: The user cannot enter his account until he has set a new password.

technicalUser.headline: Technical user management {{company}}
technicalUser.descriptionText: The technical user is an identity that a company can use to connect to CX backend services without continous disconnection. For example, a run-as technical user is required for connecting to the digital twin registry or the semantic model. Please use the action button to request a new technical user with the roles as per your need. Or manage already existing technical users by using the user management function below.
technicalUser.confirmDeleteUser: Are you sure you want to delete technical user {{ user }}?
technicalUser.noteDeleteUser: Note: The deletion will be permanently. It is not possible the reactive the user again.
technicalUser.confirmDeleteNotificationDescription: The action can not be reversed. Please create a new user in case it's needed

deleteUserConfirm.confirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete the user account of {userName}?
deleteUserConfirm.description: By deleting the account, the access of this user to Catena-X as well as any rights and data access will get revoked.
deleteUserConfirm.note: Note: If you delete the account now, you wont be able to reactivate it later.
deleteUserConfirm.successDescription: The user is successfully deleted and all rights are disabled.
deleteUserConfirm.errorDescription: Your user couldn't get deleted. Please try it later again or contact your administrator.

suspendUserConfirm.confirmTitle: Are you sure you want to suspend the user account of {userName}?
suspendUserConfirm.description: By suspending the account, the access of this user to Catena-X as well as any permissions and data accesses will get deactivated temporarily.
suspendUserConfirm.note: Note: Suspended accounts can get reactivated anytime.
suspendUserConfirm.successDescription: The user is successfully suspended and all rights are disabled.
suspendUserConfirm.errorDescription: Your user couldn't get suspended. Please try it later again or contact your administrator.

resetPasswordConfirm.confirmTitle: Are you sure you want to reset the password?
resetPasswordConfirm.note: The user {userName} will receive an email to reset the password.
resetPasswordConfirm.successDescription: The password reset request got send to {userName}.
resetPasswordConfirm.errorDescription: The password reset was unsuccessful. Please try it later again or contact the administrator.

deleteOwnUserConfirm.confirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this user account?
deleteOwnUserConfirm.description: By deleting the account, the access of this user to Catena-X as well as any rights and data access will get revoked.
deleteOwnUserConfirm.note: Note: If you delete the account now, you wont be able to reactivate it later.
deleteOwnUserConfirm.successDescription: Your user got successfully deleted, you will get disconnected within the following 5 seconds.
deleteOwnUserConfirm.errorDescription: Your user couldn't get deleted. Please try it later again or contact your administrator.

idpdetail.title: Identity Provider Details
idpdetail.selectIpsText: Select the type of IdP which should get newly created
idpdetail.addMetaDataText: Add your metadata URL here, to automatically setup all the idp integration relevant metadata. When clicking, load. then metadata file is getting loaded and respective values will show up below.
idpdetail.idp_meta_description: Add your metadata URL here, to automatically setup all the idp integration relevant metadata. When clicking, Load then metadata file is getting loaded and respective values will show up below.

addUser.headline: Add User Account
addUser.subheadline: Add a new user account by adding the user first and last name as well as the email address. Below the input fields select the respective user roles which the user should have. One role is minimum needed to enable the user to access the network.
addUser.multipleUserHeadline: Add multiple users by file upload:
addUser.multipleUserSubheadline: Please use this <1>upload template</1>, to add multiple users via the bulk load.
addUser.technicalUserSubheadline: Create a technical user by adding the relevant information requested below. Please note that the description is used for your own reference only. In case you have a number of technical users it will help you to differenciate between the technical user accounts.
addUser.technicalUserSubheadlineSuccess: Congratulations, the technical user got successfully created. Below you can find all the relevant details needed to apply the technical user for your service connection. Please ensure that you keep this secrets confidential.
addUser.helperText: Please enter all required information before proceeding.

userUpload.title: Drag & drop your files here
userUpload.subtitle: or browse files on your computer.

addUserRight.headline: Add app permissions to your company user
addUserRight.subheadline: Select one or multiple user roles with the checkboxes below as well as the relevant user/s which should receive the role.

account.resetPswrdMaxLimitError: The maximum amount of errors is triggered already. Please try it later again
account.resetPswrdUnsuccessfulError: The password reset was unsuccessful. An issue occurred. Please try It later again
account.resetPswrdPermissionsError: Reset of the password was unsuccessful due to missing permissions.

logout.message: We are logging you out now... Hope to see you again soon!

notfound.title: Something went wrong.
notfound.description: You don't have access to this page or the page doesn't exist. Please contact your admin.

reason.nopermission: you have no permission to view this content or

privacy.heading: Privacy Policy
privacy.message: The Privacy Policy states which data the business applications collects, handles and processes. The details below explicitly show which company / user information are getting collected/stored.

howtouse.heading: Relevant Documents
howtouse.message: The terms of use, as well as the data models and further information can be viewed by clicking on the documents shared below.

providerInformation.heading: Provider Information
providerInformation.message: If you have any question, want to get in contact or visit the provider website, you can find all necessary information below.

apprelease.descHeading: Publish your company app inside the Catena-X marketplace
apprelease.descMessage: Register your app and metdata to get published on the marketplace. Scrolling down, you can find a quick overview of the app release process.
apprelease.stepHeading: The process will guide your through the following steps:
apprelease.dividerText: Lets get started to publishing your app...

The app card is the first touchpoint with the customer. While entering the data below, have a look at the app card on the left side which is getting autoupdated based on your input.

serviceMarketplace.description: Dear user, you have requested service {serviceName}. Please find below the Terms and Conditions. Please check the terms and conditions carefully before proceeding. As soon as the terms & conditions are approved, the services provider will start to build up the service.

appMarketplace.headline: Order Business Application
appMarketplace.desc1: You have started the subscription request for app {appName}.
appMarketplace.desc2: Please note that the subscription request will trigger a service call on provider side. The app provider will align with you all further steps. This may take up to 5 days.
appMarketplace.desc3: As soon as all queries are finalized, the app provider will be able to activate your app tenant.
appMarketplace.desc4: As soon as this is done, a notification will be send to you, which enables you to assign the relevant user roles.
